titleStmt.title: Lucian's Charon: or, A survey of the follies of mankind Translated from the Greek. With notes, and a prefatory dialogue in vindication of translations.
titleStmt.author: Lucian, of Samosata.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Loudon Farrow, and sold by the book-sellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Copy cataloged is misbound: p. 25 (D4r) follows p. 22 (D2v).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
